title: Dj Sona summoner icon
body: Is there any other summoner icon for DJ Sona ultimate skin (when the skin is released?) if not, can we have one? if we can have one, can i suggest the DJ Sona icon on the DJ Sona teaser page? file attached.

replies.body: We have 3 summoner icons for all 3 of the soundtracks with their profile banners respectively, what exactly are you asking for, more?

> [{quoted}](name=Biopanda,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9tKjNvEt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-16T14:40:51.734+0000)
>
> We have 3 summoner icons for all 3 of the soundtracks with their profile banners respectively, what exactly are you asking for, more?

Yeah, when you change the page (for each toggle) displays another different icon (bottom of the page). I was like. "Nice, oh this one is nice too! omg, but that one!". Was just asking if those can be sold separately in any case. Like when they hit the shop with those Devonairs.

Got the RP (hopefully enough).
The icons are unlocked with the skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9tKjNvEt,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2015-02-16T19:00:21.937+0000)
>
> The icons are unlocked with the skin.

Omg not those. The other ones. Bottom page. Very bottom page.

Edit: yes, i like those 3, but i just wanted to know if there would be the chance to get those other 3 designs (those **page** designs on the bottom of the page itself).

I do see the images you're referring to, but they won't be icons. 

There's only three icons for DJ Sona, and they'll be unlocking upon purchasing the skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9tKjNvEt,comment-id=00000000000200000000,timestamp=2015-02-16T19:10:03.686+0000)
>
> I do see the images you're referring to, but they won't be icons. 
> 
> There's only three icons for DJ Sona, and they'll be unlocking upon purchasing the skin.

aw, thats too bad. Well, thats all that i wanted to know.

Thanks anyway.
They probably won't be sold separably. It wasn't that way with Spirit Guard Udyr.

> [{quoted}](name=Hoffmisc,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9tKjNvEt,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-02-16T17:17:28.619+0000)
>
> They probably won't be sold separably. It wasn't that way with Spirit Guard Udyr.

No, we are talking about the designs from the DJ Sona teaser page. Each page (from the 3) has a different bottom page design with a little logo-like reference according to each DJ Sona Toggle stance.

Edit: they could do a bundle.

> [{quoted}](name=Saevum,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=9tKjNvEt,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-16T14:45:11.387+0000)
>
> Yeah, when you change the page (for each toggle) displays another different icon (bottom of the page). I was like. "Nice, oh this one is nice too! omg, but that one!". Was just asking if those can be sold separately in any case. Like when they hit the shop with those Devonairs.
> 
> Got the RP (hopefully enough).

Oh I see, that makes more sense now. Dunno if they're going to do it, but we can always hope.

Yeh, i know.

Guess i can save them for the future. Maybe someday, we may be able to customize our board profile pic.
Well, it looks like you already got your answer, from a Rioter no less.

Final comment.

The Ethereal one was so sweet.
